alert.note: Alert for Chester; Decatur; Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 1:59PM CDT until August 09 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McNairy County in west Tennessee... Hardin County in west Tennessee... East central Chester County in west Tennessee... Southern Decatur County in west Tennessee... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adamsville, or 9 miles west of Savannah, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Savannah, Adamsville, Sardis, Olive Hill, Morris Chapel, Crump, Saltillo, Milledgeville, Enville, Good Hope, Right, Phillips, Old Lawton, Hinkle, Pleasant Grove, Cabo, Walkertown, Olivehill, Purdy and Cerro Gordo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
